text:
Android Developer @ Virgin Pulse (Boston / Framingham)

Team Lead & Mid Level Native ANDROID Developer

Superb Salary Package + 10% Bonus + 4 Weeks Vacation + VP Equity!!! Relocation Available.

Virgin Pulse is creating a product that will enhance the mobile experience. You will be part of a small global team to produce compelling personal mobile apps for a soon to be released wearable device while interfacing daily with product and design teams.

Email: allan.vonschenkel@virginpulse.com
